home.finalAciRelease: A simplified process from application to final ACI release.
home.createRequestDesc: The exporter or importer creates an ACI order with all the shipment details and financial data.
home.importerAgreeDesc: The importer reviews the full ACI data and agrees to it.
home.customsAgreeDesc: The customs reviews the ACI data and agrees to enter the shipment.
home.issueAciDesc: Once agreed, an ACI is issued and the goods can be shipped.
home.newCompanyEntry: A new company from Egypt has joined the platform.
home.forWhoDesc: This platform serves the main partners in the import-export process.
home.exportersDesc: Foreign companies that sell and ship goods to Libyan companies.
home.importersDesc: Libyan companies that buy and receive goods from foreign companies.
home.aciVervcationDesc: Verify the validity of an ACI number.

description: This is a sample app using i18n.
